mosaikDockerDocsUrl.title: mosaik-docker documentation URL
mosaikDockerDocsUrl.description: URL to the (external) documentation for the mosaik-docker package. This URL will be opened in a new window by the correponding item in the launcher.

mosaikDockerJLDocsUrl.title: JupyterLab mosaik-docker extension documentation URL
mosaikDockerJLDocsUrl.description: URL to the (external) documentation for the mosaik-docker-jl package. This URL will be opened in a new window by the correponding item in the launcher.

mosaikDockerCliDocsUrl.title: mosaik-docker CLI reference URL
mosaikDockerCliDocsUrl.description: URL to the (external) documentation for the mosaik-docker CLI. This URL will be opened in a new window by the correponding item in the launcher.

mosaikDockerPyDocsUrl.title: mosaik-docker Python API reference URL
mosaikDockerPyDocsUrl.description: URL to the (external) documentation for the mosaik-docker Python API. This URL will be opened in a new window by the correponding item in the launcher.
